paragraphs.text: Great use of visuals, Peter! They kept me engaged and helped better my understanding of your process. It was a pleasure collaborating with you on this article.

paragraphs.text: Great case study! I am a junior UX/UI designer and it was very enlightening for me to see how you identified and tackled each user pain point.
